sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Button, Item, Icon, Image, Label, Divider } from 'semantic-ui-react';
import "semantic-ui-css"
const EnterpCard = (props) => {
    console.log(props)
    return (
            <Item style={{marginTop:"3vh",width: "95%", marginLeft: "3vw" }}>
          
                <Item.Image size='small' src={props.img} style={{marginLeft:"25vw",boxShadow: " 5px 10px 18px #888888"}}/>
                <Item.Content  verticalAlign="middle" style={{marginLeft:"-10vw",textShadow: "3px 3px 3px #888888,5px 5px 7px #888888"}}>
                    <Item.Header style={{display:"block"}}>{props.content}</Item.Header>
                    <Button onClick={e=>props.onClick(e,props.index)} style={{marginTop:"1vh"}}>Watch And Update
            <Icon name='right chevron' />
                </Button>
                </Item.Content>
            </Item>
    )
}

export default EnterpCard
